title: She Came to Me Casts Steve Carell, Amy Schumer and Nicole Kidman
text:
SHARE She Came to Me adds cast members Steve Carell, Amy Schumer and Nicole Kidman 
OddLot Entertainment ( Hell or High Water ) has added three new cast members to the upcoming film She Came to Me . The film will was written and will be directed by Rebecca Miller, daughter of playwright Arthur Miller . Steve Carell ( The Office , The 40-Year-Old Virgin ), Amy Schumer ( Inside Amy Schumer , Trainwreck and Nicole Kidman ( Moulin Rouge! , Eyes Wide Shut ) have signed on for the picture. The plot of She Came to Me is still vague, but has been described as a “sweeping comedic drama,” and a “multigenerational story about family and the complexities of modern life.” 
RELATED: Steve Carell Joins Beautiful Boy 
Gigi Pritzker and Rachel Shane are producing through OddLot Entertainment. Miller is producing She Came to Me with Damon Cardasis through banner Round Films. Miller is also known for directing The Many Lives of Pippa Lee and Maggie’s Plan . Carell has a number of films coming out, including the animated film Despicable Me 3 , the addiction drama Beautiful Boy with The Office co-star Amy Ryan and the tennis film Battle of the Sexes with Emma Stone. Kidman is currently starring with Shailene Woodley and Reese Witherspoon in the HBO series Big Little Lies . Schumer will star with Goldie Hawn in the comedy Snatched and with Miles Teller and Haley Bennett in the PTSD post-military service drama Thank You for Your Service , which just set a release date of October 27, 2017. She recently dropped out of the Barbie film due to scheduling conflicts. She also has a new stand-up special on Netflix. 
What do you think of the casting of Steve Carell, Amy Schumer and Nicole Kidman? Does that sound like great chemistry? Are you excited to check out the film? Let us know in the comments or tweet us your thoughts @ComingSoonnet .
